issue.title: third party validation - reject pop-up does not show up
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

If a want to reject an order as validator manager, I click in the Action menu and then choose "Reject the order".

>> I have an error message "You must select an order to reject and type a message."




**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Works like a charm. Thanks Jérôme.
